meta.title: An Overview of Chinese Townships (without urban registered population)

nodes.body: This type of township is more rural and lacks a significant urban section. In the TAR and Tibetan parts of Sichuan, this is rendered as "shang," while in Qinghai it is often translated into Tibetan as "zhang" (ཞང་།).
nodes.title: An Overview of Chinese Townships (without urban registered population)
